pytanix package¶

Submodules¶

pytanix.client module¶

class pytanix.client.Nutanix(ip, auth=None, requests_session=True)[source]¶

Bases: object

Example usage:

import pytanix
nu = pytanix.Nutanix()
alerts = nu.alerts()
print(alerts)

  • schedule_id – ID of the snapshot schedule
  • payload – json snapshot schedule configuration
